ingredients: 1 kg pumpkin, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, 800 ml vegetable broth, salt, pepper, bay leaf, nutmeg, 100 g cream
instructions: Peel and chop the pumpkin and onion. Saute onion, then add the pumpkin and stir for a few minutes. Then add broth and simmer for simmer 25 mins. Blend and add cream.

ingredients: 5 apples, 200 g flour, 100 g butter, 80 g sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp lemon juice, pinch of salt
instructions: Prepare dough, mix apples with sugar and cinnamon, fill crust, bake 50 mins at 180°C.

ingredients: 1 romaine lettuce, 100 g croutons, 50 g parmesan cheese, 150 g chicken breast, Caesar dressing
instructions: Grill chicken and slice. Toss lettuce with dressing, top with chicken, croutons, and parmesan.

ingredients: 200 g flour, 100 g butter, 150 g sugar, 1 egg, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 150 g chocolate chips, 1 tsp baking soda, pinch of salt
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Cream butter and sugar, add egg and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients and fold in chocolate chips. Bake 10-12 mins at 180°C.

ingredients: 400 g spaghetti, 2 carrots, 2 stalks of greens, 300 g ground beef, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 400 g canned tomatoes, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper, basil
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Saute onion,garlic, carrots and stalks of greens, add beef and brown. Add tomatoes and simmer 40 mins. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

ingredients: 2 tomatoes, 1 cucumber, 1 green bell pepper, 100 g feta cheese, 50 g olives, 1 red onion, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, oregano, salt, pepper
instructions: Chop vegetables and combine in a bowl. Add olives and feta. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with oregano, salt, and pepper.

ingredients: 3 ripe bananas, 200 g flour, 100 g sugar, 100 g butter, 2 eggs, 1 tsp baking soda, pinch of salt, 1 tsp vanilla extract
instructions: Mash bananas. Mix dry ingredients. Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients and mashed bananas. Bake 60 mins at 175°C.

ingredients: 500 g chicken breast, 2 onions, 3 garlic cloves, 1 tbsp ginger, 2 tbsp curry powder, 400 ml coconut milk, 2 tbsp vegetable oil, salt, pepper
instructions: Saute onions, garlic and ginger. Add chicken and brown. Stir in curry powder, then add coconut milk. Simmer 30 mins. Season with salt and pepper.

ingredients: 1 broccoli head, 2 carrots, 1 bell pepper, 100 g snap peas, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tsp ginger
instructions: Chop vegetables. Heat sesame oil in a wok, add garlic and ginger. Stir-fry vegetables for 5-7 mins. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 mins.

ingredients: 3 eggs, 50 g cheese, 1 tomato, 1 green onion, salt, pepper, 1 tbsp butter
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a pan, pour in eggs. Add chopped tomato and green onion. Cook until set, sprinkle cheese on top and fold.

ingredients: 400 g ground beef, 8 taco shells, 1 onion, 2 garlic cloves, 1 tbsp taco seasoning, lettuce, tomato, cheese, salsa
instructions: Cook ground beef with onion, garlic and taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomato, cheese and salsa.

ingredients: 200 g flour, 2 eggs, 300 ml milk, 1 tbsp sugar, pinch of salt, oil for cooking
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in eggs and milk until smooth. Heat oil in a pan and cook pancakes until golden on both sides.
